channel.title: Camellia Sinensis on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Camellia Sinensis on funPlantGenes

item.title: CmMYB15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmMYB15 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 15 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of CmMYB15 provides chrysanthemum resistance to aphids by regulating the biosynthesis of lignin.

item.title: CsAAP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA031577.1 Gene Symbol: CsAAP1 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsAlaDC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsAlaDC Gene Name: Alanine decarboxylase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Comparing to CsAlaDC, its ancestral enzyme CsSDC exhibited a higher specific activity and a better thermal and pH stability, indicating that CsSDC acquired the optimized function after a longer evolutionary period.

item.title: CsANRa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsANRa Gene Name: Camellia sinensis Anthocyanidin reductasea Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsANSa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CSS0010687 Gene Symbol: CsANSa Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsbZIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsbZIP1 Gene Name: bZIP transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsbZIP1-CsMYB12 mediates the production of bitter-tasting flavonols in tea plants (Camellia sinensis) through a coordinated activator-repressor network.

item.title: CsCYP82D47
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA023255 Gene Symbol: CsCYP82D47 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsDFRa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsDFRa Gene Name: dihydroflavonol 4-reductase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Site-directed mutagenesis revealed that the two amino acid residues S117 and T123 of CsDFRa play a prominent role in controlling DFR reductase activity.

item.title: CsDFRb1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsDFRb1 Gene Name: dihydroflavonol 4-reductase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Functional analysis of the dihydroflavonol 4-reductase family of Camellia sinensis: exploiting key amino acids to reconstruct reduction activity.

item.title: CsDFRb3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsDFRb3 Gene Name: dihydroflavonol 4-reductase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Functional analysis of the dihydroflavonol 4-reductase family of Camellia sinensis: exploiting key amino acids to reconstruct reduction activity.

item.title: CsDFRc
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsDFRc Gene Name: dihydroflavonol 4-reductase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Enzyme activity analyses revealed that the two recombinant proteins CsDFRa and CsDFRc exhibited DFR activity, converting dihydroflavonols into leucoanthocyanins in vitro, but CsDFRb1 and CsDFRb3 did not.

item.title: CsERF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsERF2 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 2 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsERF2, an ethylene response factor, plays a role in leaf variegation.

item.title: CsF3Ha
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CSS0016177 Gene Symbol: CsF3Ha Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsGDH2.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CSS0034454 Gene Symbol: CsGDH2.1 Gene Name: glutamate dehydrolase 2 Genome: tea genome database TPIA (tpia.

item.title: CsGGT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsGGT2 Gene Name: γ-glutamyl-transpeptidase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: γ-Glutamyl-transpeptidase CsGGT2 functions as light-activated theanine hydrolase in tea plant.

item.title: CsGLK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsGLK1 Gene Name: GOLDEN2 LIKE1 Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsHDA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsHDA2 Gene Name: histone deacetylase 2 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Involvement of histone deacetylase CsHDA2 in regulating (E)-nerolidol formation in tea exposed to tea green leafhopper infestation.

item.title: CsHSFA1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA030860 Gene Symbol: CsHSFA1b Gene Name: Camellia sinensis Heat stress factors A1b Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsHSFA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA023633 Gene Symbol: CsHSFA2 Gene Name: Camellia sinensis Heat stress factors A2 Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsINV5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsINV5 Gene Name: Vacuolar invertase 5 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsINV5, a tea vacuolar invertase gene enhances cold tolerance in transgenic Arabidopsis.

item.title: CsJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA001681.1 Gene Symbol: CsJAZ1 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsJAZ6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsJAZ6 Gene Name: Camellia sinensis JASMONATE-ZIM DOMAIN6 Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsKPI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsKPI1 Gene Name: Kunitz protease inhibitor 1 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Under Ectropis oblique attack, CsKPI1 expression and jasmonic acid (JA) levels were more abundant in both insect-damaged leaf tissues and undamaged neighboring leaves.

item.title: CsKPI2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsKPI2 Gene Name: Kunitz protease inhibitor 2 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: The overall findings suggest that the transcriptional divergence of KPI genes after duplication led to the specialized role of CsKPI1 in the physiological response to insect stress; the functional conservation between CsKPI2 and CsKPI3 confers resistance to pathogen infection in tea plant.

item.title: CsKPI3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsKPI3 Gene Name: Kunitz protease inhibitor 3 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: The overall findings suggest that the transcriptional divergence of KPI genes after duplication led to the specialized role of CsKPI1 in the physiological response to insect stress; the functional conservation between CsKPI2 and CsKPI3 confers resistance to pathogen infection in tea plant.

item.title: CsLAZY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CSS025254 Gene Symbol: CsLAZY1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsLAZY1 mediates shoot gravitropism and branch angle in tea plants.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA026462 Gene Symbol: CsLHT1 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA003706 Gene Symbol: CsLHT6 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsLIS/NES
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsLIS/NES Gene Name: cultivar Suchazao bifunctional terpenoid synthase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Implementation of CsLIS/NES in linalool biosynthesis involves transcript splicing regulation in Camellia sinensis.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYB1 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CSS0046378 Gene Symbol: CsMYB113 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsMYB12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYB12 Gene Name: MYB12 protein Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsbZIP1-CsMYB12 mediates the production of bitter-tasting flavonols in tea plants (Camellia sinensis) through a coordinated activator-repressor network.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA029017 Gene Symbol: CsMYB184 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYB2 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Two MYB transcription factors (CsMYB2 and CsMYB26) are involved in flavonoid biosynthesis in tea plant.

item.title: CsMYB4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA003515.1 Gene Symbol: CsMYB4a Gene Name: R2R3-MYB Sg4 member from Camellia sinensis Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYB4a works synergistically with CsIAA4 and participates in regulation of the auxin pathway in stamen.

item.title: CsMYB62
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CSS0015964 Gene Symbol: CsMYB62 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsMYB73
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA014193.1 Gene Symbol: CsMYB73 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 73 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYB73 negatively regulates theanine accumulation mediated by CsGGT2 and CsGGT4 in tea shoots.

item.title: CsMYB75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene017036 Gene Symbol: CsMYB75 Gene Name: MYB75 protein Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: A coupled role for CsMYB75 and CsGSTF1 in anthocyanin hyperaccumulation in purple tea.

item.title: CsMYBL2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYBL2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYBL2 homologs modulate the light and temperature stress-regulated anthocyanin and catechins biosynthesis in tea plants.

item.title: CsMYBL2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMYBL2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYBL2 homologs modulate the light and temperature stress-regulated anthocyanin and catechins biosynthesis in tea plants.

item.title: CsREV
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsREV Gene Name: REVOLUTA Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsREV predominantly localized in the cambium and xylem, and its expression pattern overlapped with the deposition of cellulose and lignin in leaf veins.

item.title: CsS40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CSS0010485.1 Gene Symbol: CsS40 Gene Name: Camellia sinensis Senescnece 40 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor CsS40 negatively regulates TCS1 expression and caffeine biosynthesis in connection to leaf senescence in Camellia sinensis.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSERPIN1 Gene Name: serpin-ZX-like Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsSERPIN1 may be involved in tea plant defenses against herbivores.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSWEET17 Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter 17 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsSWEET1a and CsSWEET17 Mediate Growth and Freezing Tolerance by Promoting Sugar Transport across the Plasma Membrane.

item.title: CsSWEET1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSWEET1a Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsSWEET1a and CsSWEET17 Mediate Growth and Freezing Tolerance by Promoting Sugar Transport across the Plasma Membrane.

item.title: CsTCP14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsTCP14 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsTCPs regulate shoot tip development and catechin biosynthesis in tea plant.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsTCP4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsTCPs regulate shoot tip development and catechin biosynthesis in tea plant.

item.title: CsUGT84J2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA000239 Gene Symbol: CsUGT84J2 Gene Name: Al-induced glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Found that flavonol glycoside levels in tea roots increased following Al treatment, and the Al-induced UDP glycosyltransferase CsUGT84J2 was involved in this mechanism.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CSS0040530 Gene Symbol: CsUGT89AC1 Gene Name: Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsWRKY40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CSS004414 Gene Symbol: CsWRKY40 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 40 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CsWRKY40 regulates L-theanine hydrolysis by activating the CsPDX2.

item.title: CsXDH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsXDH1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsXDH1 gene promotes caffeine catabolism induced by continuous strong light in tea plant.

item.title: GWHTACFB001163
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsWRKY13 Gene Symbol: GWHTACFB001163 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsWRKY13 acts as a negative regulator of lignin biosynthesis in tea plants.

item.title: miRn211-TLP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA018163.1 Gene Symbol: miRn211-TLP Gene Name: miRn211-thaumatin-like protein Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Co-expression network analysis demonstrated that miR530b-ethylene responsive factor 96 (ERF96) and miRn211-thaumatin-like protein (TLP) play crucial roles in the response to GB.
